local_intent: Align to the brown_object, attempt a side grasp with retries, then verify the object is in the gripper.
assumptions: brown_object has been detected and is visible
Gripper was opened prior to grasp attempt
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase from GLOBAL_BT: ApproachAndAlign -> Pick (with retry) -> ObjectInGripper, preceding RaiseHeld.
